introduction.heading: Choose your activities
introduction.sub-heading: Find activities that can help you get work
introduction.action-overview-1: You'll see a list of activities that you could try out.
introduction.action-overview-2: There's lots of different things to try. They have all helped people find work - see which ones are right for you.
introduction.action-2: Pick an activity and say whether you're interested or not
introduction.action-3: Get more information about all the activities you're interested in at the end.
introduction.post-action-overview: Your choices will all be saved - you can leave and come back any time.

unsorted-activities.heading: Choose some activities
unsorted-activities.action-overview-1: Choose an activity from the list below, and decide whether it's right for you. You can put it into one of 5 categories.
unsorted-activities.action-overview-2: When you've finished sorting the activities into a list, you can find out more about them - they've all helped people get work or earn more.
unsorted-activities.action-finish-detail: You can find out more or rearrange the activities on the next page.

sorted-activities.heading: Choose your activities
sorted-activities.activities-text-1: Get more details about each of the activities - tips, advice and links to useful websites.
sorted-activities.activities-text-2: You can get back to your list from the 'Choose your activities' to-do. Once you've marked that as 'done', there will be a link in your journal that you can use instead.
sorted-activities.activities-text-3: You can still move the activities around if you've changed your mind about where they should go.
